product_name: GarnierSkinActive Micellar Cleansing Water with Rose Water
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingGarnier SkinActive Micellar Cleansing Water with Rose Water gently cleanses skin, removes makeup and hydrates all in 1 step.
details: DetailsBenefitsWater Rose Micellar Cleansing Water cleanses, removes makeup and hydrates skin all-in-1Micellar lifts away dirt, oil and makeup without harsh rubbing leaving skin clean and hydratedMicellar water is paraben free, fragrance free, sulfate freeNo-rinse makeup remover cleanses and hydrates skinFormulated WithoutAlcoholFragranceOilsParabensSulfatesItem 2553715How To UsePour onto cotton pad until fully saturated. Gently wipe pad across face to cleanse and remove face makeup. To remove eye makeup, hold pad over closed eyelids for a few seconds, then gently wipe away. Use daily. No need to rinse.Precautions: Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse thoroughly with water.IngredientsAqua/Water, Propanediol, Rosa Damascena Flower Water, Glycerin, Coco-Betaine, Sodium Benzoate, Caprylyl/Capryl Glucoside, Sodium Chloride, Citric Acid, Arginine, Salicylic Acid.
how_to_use: Pour onto cotton pad until fully saturated. Gently wipe pad across face to cleanse and remove face makeup. To remove eye makeup, hold pad over closed eyelids for a few seconds, then gently wipe away. Use daily. No need to rinse.Precautions: Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse thoroughly with water.

reviews.headline: Gentle, Glowy, and My Skin Loves It!
reviews.comments: Perfect for my morning and evening routine and it's become a staple in my skincare ritual. Highly recommend for anyone with sensitive or mature skin who wants something effective and nourishing!

reviews.headline: My go-to morning cleanser
reviews.comments:
I have used this product basically since it came out. 

I find that other Micellar waters either smell bad, are drying, or leave residue. 

I like this one because my face always feels refreshed, not irritated, and no noticeable residue. I think the packaging is cute and effective at dispensing in the smaller size bottle. I have emptied more bottles of this than I can count and I will continue to buy!

The only con is that it does not cut through heavier makeup very well for me, which is fine because I tend to use it as a light cleanser anyways.

reviews.headline: I continue to buy this product over and over!
reviews.comments: I love the Garnier SkinActive Micellar Cleansing Water as it removes my makeup and doesn't dry out my skin. A friend of mine actually turned it on to me and I have not stopped using it since! No hard chemicals either! Its the best!

reviews.headline: Meh
reviews.comments: It removes my makeup well but it burns my eyessss and I've tried 3 different versions ðŸ˜­ helppp why do they all burn so bad

reviews.headline: Great product!
reviews.comments: Love this makeup remover.

reviews.headline: Highly recommend
reviews.comments: Works great. Feels amazing on my skin.

reviews.headline: I would but this product again and again
reviews.comments: The best product and practic

reviews.headline: How does this have so many good reviews?
reviews.comments: I used to use Garnier Micellar water loyally a few years ago, but did cleansing balm for a little bit. I decided to come back to what i thought was my tried and true and HOLY MOLY this is the worst makeup remover I have EVER used. Does NOT remove mascara at all, and it stings when I use it. I've used it 4 times now and have wasted 1/4 of the bottle with the amount I have had to use.

reviews.headline: I would buy again! Works perfect every time.
reviews.comments: Love
It burn my eyes

reviews.headline: Best makeup remover ever
reviews.comments: I never wanted to wear mascara because it was such a pain to take off. Well, now I wear it daily because it is so easy to take it off with this water. I love how easy it is to use and the bottle lasts a very long time. I would recommend this to others to use for a clean face.

reviews.headline: Absolutely love this!!!
reviews.comments: I have dry skin & this cleanser leaves my face clean & hydrated.

reviews.headline: No thanks
reviews.comments: I thought I would try this as I love the other micellar waters, but turns out it made my sensitive skin irritated. My eyes would be burning after using it and my face would break out into a rash. Returned less than a week.

reviews.headline: love
reviews.comments: i love most of the micellar waters from this brand. i like rosewater and this does feel very refreshing. im not sure if its very hydrating though, maybe just compared to the other ones.

reviews.headline: amaaaaziinggg
reviews.comments: i bought this cleanser bc i was in a rush and omg it's so refreshing to put on ur face, smells great, and removes makeup easily! i will def be repurchasing.

reviews.headline: I would buy again
reviews.comments: It cleansed my face and made it soft

reviews.headline: Micellar cleaning oil
reviews.comments: Ok for general cleaning, doesn't take off mascara

reviews.headline: Works great just strong scent
reviews.comments: It works just like the other ones. Removes all my makeup and it doesn't feel damaging on my skin. The only downside is it smells very strong of rose water. I was expecting a light scent but it lowkey smells like perfume

reviews.headline: Amazing
reviews.comments: I received a free maybelline mascara with it and this just makes my skin glowy, cleanses and of course removes makeup!

reviews.headline: Best Micellar Cleansing Water
reviews.comments: Garnier Skin Active Micellar Water with Rose Water is a gentle makeup remover with a nice rose scent.  Effectively removes mascara and foundation without scrubbing or pulling your skin.  I highly recommend this Micellar water as it is a generous size.

media.headline: I would but this product again and again
media.caption: I loved

media.headline: Best Makeup Remover!!!!!!
media.caption: Did half my face to show and the rest. That's ONE cotton round for my whole face!

media.headline: Best Makeup Remover!!!!!!
media.caption: Before and after! It took seconds to remove my makeup!

faceoff_positive.comments:
What is this sorcery!?!?!?!?!
This is an amazing product! Totally worth every penny! I have sensitive skin that breaks out easily. As well as very sensitive eyes. I had zero eye irritation and removing makeup from my eyes took seconds with zero effort. I legit used ONE cotton round to remove my WHOLE face!(foundation, powder, bronzer, eyeshadow, mascara, setting spray, lipliner on my lips) My skin feels smooth and completely dry to the touch, NOT ONE BIT OF OILINESS! I am very much impressed. This has no scent whatsoever. I highly recommend. Whatever your using seriously, stop and try this!
faceoff_positive.headline: Best Makeup Remover!!!!!!

faceoff_negative.comments: This product does work well getting makeup off on the first try, but the purpose of the product is that you aren't supposed to have to wash your face with your regular face wash afterward. The manufacturer's website even says it is not supposed to require rinsing. I used this and the next day my husband said my face looked glistening. That's not a compliment on my type of skin because it means my face was oily. I learned my lesson. Next time, I'll have to wash my face with face wash after using because I am stuck with this whole bottle of product.
faceoff_negative.headline: Wouldn't suggest this product if you have oily skin
